code: import{createBrowserHistory}from"history";import{applyMiddleware,createStore}from"redux";import createSagaMiddleware from"redux-saga";import createRootReducer from"../reducer";import rootSaga from"../saga/index";export var history=createBrowserHistory();var sagaMiddleWare=createSagaMiddleware();export var configStore=function configStore(){var store=createStore(createRootReducer(history),applyMiddleware(sagaMiddleWare));sagaMiddleWare.run(rootSaga);return store;};
